message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, $120 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $160. This is still a good value for you, considering the product's worth. Let's see if we can make this work.
I appreciate you coming down to $160, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $140.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $140 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $145, which is a fair compromise. This is my final offer. If it doesn't work for you, I'll have to go with another buyer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $130.
